title: 1n4ho12
author: 1n4ho12
content: Hello Bitcoiners,I have been trying to mine BTC and I receive the following error: stratum_subscribe timed out.Googled this error and found that is probably a connection error.I have a ZTE f680 router and i disabled all security features and still getting the same error.Help please.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: And you are using what make/model of ASIC miner?If you are attempting to use just CPU or GPU -- forget it...

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: stratum_subscribe timed out is most likely error from ccminer.This is not the right place to ask this I'd suggest you to bring this issue to altcoin mining if your are mining with GPU/CPU.
